course_description: This course is designed to provide students the opportunity to explore issues in economic development viewed from the perspective of sub-Saharan Africa from the impact of slavery and colonialism to the modern era of globalization.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON _OX 100 or ECON 101 or ECON_OX 101 or FIN 201 AND ECON 112  or ECON_OX112 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3307, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: M. Ayogu, Status: Closed
